metadata.title: CVE-2019-3809 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle versions 3.1 to 3.1.15 and earlier unsupportedversions. The mybackpack functionality allowed setting the URL of badges,when it should be restricted to the Mozilla Open Badges backpack URL. Thisresulted in the possibility of blind SSRF via requests made by the page.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
